tables.name: dydx_aux_accounting_view
tables.description: This table provides auxiliary accounting information for DYDX, a decentralized exchange on the Cosmos ecosystem. It offers a comprehensive view of the DYDX financials, including labels, categories, and amounts.

columns.name: labels
columns.description: Short description of the labels used in the DYDX accounting view, including asset and token names.

columns.name: category
columns.description: Category of the transaction or event, such as 'token' or 'fee', providing context for the accounting information.

columns.name: amount
columns.description: The amount of the transaction or event, expressed in the relevant currency or token.

tables.name: dydx_balance_module_account
tables.description: This module provides a balance overview of accounts on the Cosmos ecosystem. It aggregates balance data for each day, account, and denomination.

columns.name: day
columns.description: The day of the balance measurement, in a Unix timestamp format.

columns.name: address
columns.description: The blockchain address of the account holding the balance.

columns.name: denom
columns.description: The denomination of the asset held in the account, e.g., 'uatom' for a single atom.

columns.name: amount
columns.description: The balance of the account in the specified denomination.

tables.name: dydx_block_events
tables.description: This table provides information about block events from the Cosmos ecosystem, offering insights into the transactions and activities occurring on the network. Users can utilize this data to analyze the performance and behavior of the Cosmos blockchain.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the event occurred, representing the block's position in the blockchain.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block was created, indicating when the event took place.

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: A unique index identifying the event within the block, allowing for efficient retrieval and analysis of specific events.

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: The type of event that occurred, such as a transaction or smart contract execution, providing context for the event's significance.

columns.name: event_attributes
columns.description: Additional attributes associated with the event, offering further details about the event's characteristics and impact.

columns.name: source
columns.description: The source of the event data, indicating the specific blockchain or network from which the data was obtained.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the event data was ingested into the system, representing the data's freshness and availability.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: The version of the schema used to structure and organize the event data, ensuring compatibility and consistency across different versions.

tables.name: dydx_blocks
tables.description: This table contains data about blocks in the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into network activity and performance over time. It captures key metrics at the block level, allowing for analysis of the underlying blockchain infrastructure.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in the blockchain, representing the total number of blocks mined up to that point.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was created, indicating the time when the transactions within that block were finalized.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the blockchain, differentiating it from other chains within the Cosmos ecosystem.

columns.name: proposer_address
columns.description: The address of the validator that proposed the block, responsible for collecting and broadcasting transactions within the block.

columns.name: validators_hash
columns.description: A hash of the validators involved in the block proposal process, capturing their participation in validating the transactions.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block data was ingested into the system, representing the time when the data became available for analysis.

columns.name: messages_bytes
columns.description: The total number of bytes in all messages (transactions) within the block, providing insight into network traffic and data volume.

columns.name: tx_count
columns.description: The total number of transactions within the block, indicating the volume of activity within the blockchain network.

tables.name: dydx_cancel_order
tables.description: This table captures cancellation events of orders on the DyDx platform, providing insights into the trading activity on the network. Cancellations can occur due to various reasons, including changes in market conditions or user-initiated actions.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the cancellation event occurred.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in which the cancellation event occurred.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The hash of the transaction in which the cancellation event occurred.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction in the block in which the cancellation event occurred.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message in the transaction in which the cancellation event occurred.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action in the message in which the cancellation event occurred.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the sender who initiated the cancellation event.

columns.name: subaccount
columns.description: The subaccount associated with the sender who initiated the cancellation event.

columns.name: order_id
columns.description: The ID of the order that was cancelled.

columns.name: market_id
columns.description: The ID of the market in which the order was cancelled.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The type of cancellation event (e.g. user-initiated, limit price exceeded, etc.).

columns.name: expiration_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the order would have expired if not cancelled.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the cancellation event was ingested into the database.

tables.name: dydx_delegate
tables.description: This table contains information about transactions related to Delegators on the Cosmos blockchain ecosystem. It provides insights into the Delegators' interactions with the network.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block at which the transaction was confirmed.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block was created.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction in the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message in the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action in the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the account that initiated the transaction.

columns.name: validator
columns.description: The validator that executed the transaction.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens involved in the transaction.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the tokens involved in the transaction.

columns.name: new_shares
columns.description: The new shares of the token that resulted from the transaction.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: dydx_deposit
tables.description: This table contains a record of deposits made on the Cosmos ecosystem. It provides information on the transactions that took place, including sender and recipient details.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction occurred.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in which the transaction occurred.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the sender of the transaction.

columns.name: recipient
columns.description: The address of the recipient of the transaction.

columns.name: recipient_subaccount
columns.description: The subaccount of the recipient address, if applicable.

columns.name: quantums
columns.description: The amount of the asset being transferred, represented in quantum units.

columns.name: asset_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the asset being transferred.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: dydx_match
tables.description: This table represents a match between a maker and a taker in the DyDX perpetual exchange, providing insights into the trading activities within the Cosmos ecosystem. It contains details about the order execution, trading fees, and other relevant metrics.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the match was recorded.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in which the match was recorded.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction in which the match occurred.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message.

columns.name: taker
columns.description: The address of the taker in the match.

columns.name: taker_subaccount
columns.description: The subaccount of the taker in the match.

columns.name: taker_order_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the taker's order in the match.

columns.name: maker
columns.description: The address of the maker in the match.

columns.name: maker_subaccount
columns.description: The subaccount of the maker in the match.

columns.name: maker_order_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the maker's order in the match.

columns.name: taker_order_fee_quote_quantums
columns.description: The fees paid by the taker in quote quantums.

columns.name: maker_order_fee_quote_quantums
columns.description: The fees paid by the maker in quote quantums.

columns.name: maker_quote_balance_delta_quote_quantums
columns.description: The change in the maker's quote balance in quote quantums.

columns.name: taker_quote_balance_delta_quote_quantums
columns.description: The change in the taker's quote balance in quote quantums.

columns.name: maker_perpetual_quantums_delta_base_quantums
columns.description: The change in the maker's perpetual quantums in base quantums.

columns.name: taker_perpetual_quantums_delta_base_quantums
columns.description: The change in the taker's perpetual quantums in base quantums.

columns.name: insurance_fund_delta_quote_quantums
columns.description: The change in the insurance fund in quote quantums.

columns.name: is_liquidation
columns.description: A flag indicating whether the match was a liquidation.

columns.name: is_deleverage
columns.description: A flag indicating whether the match was a deleverage.

columns.name: perpetual_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the perpetual in the match.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: dydx_mempool_transactions
tables.description: This table contains information about pending transactions on the Cosmos ecosystem's mempool, providing insights into transaction activity and network congestion. It serves as a real-time indicator of the blockchain's current state and can be used to analyze trends and patterns in transaction volume.

columns.name: attributes
columns.description: Attributes associated with the transaction, such as sender and recipient addresses, transaction type, and other metadata.

columns.name: publish_time
columns.description: Timestamp when the transaction was published to the mempool, indicating the time it was received by the network.

columns.name: message_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the transaction message, used to track its status and any potential errors.

columns.name: subscription_name
columns.description: Name of the subscription used to receive the transaction data, providing context on the source of the information.

columns.name: data
columns.description: Raw transaction data, containing detailed information about the transaction, such as sender and recipient addresses, transaction amount, and transaction type.

tables.name: dydx_message_events
tables.description: This table provides information about block events occurring in the Cosmos ecosystem. It offers insights into the activities and transactions happening across various blockchain networks.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the event occurred.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block was created.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction that triggered the event.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: The index of the event within the message.

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: The type of event that occurred.

columns.name: event_attributes
columns.description: Additional attributes associated with the event.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the data was ingested into the system.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: The version of the schema used to store the data.

tables.name: dydx_message_senders
tables.description: This table contains information about the senders of messages within the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into the activity of various entities within the network.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the message was sent, indicating the position of the transaction within the blockchain.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block containing the message was mined, indicating the time at which the transaction was processed.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction in which the message was sent, linking the message to its parent transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block, providing a way to identify the transaction's position within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction, allowing for the identification of the message within its parent transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message, enabling the identification of the specific action within the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The entity that sent the message, indicating the source of the message within the Cosmos ecosystem.

columns.name: action
columns.description: The action performed by the message, describing the specific operation that was executed within the Cosmos ecosystem.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the data was ingested into the database, indicating the time at which the data was recorded.

tables.name: dydx_message_types_transactions
tables.description: This table provides a collection of transaction messages from various blockchains within the Cosmos ecosystem. It captures the metadata associated with these transactions, enabling analysis and insights into the blockchain activity.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The current height of the block in the blockchain, indicating the order of transactions.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was created, representing the time of transaction occurrence.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction, allowing for tracking and verification across the blockchain network.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block, facilitating the ordering of transactions within a single block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction, enabling the analysis of multiple messages within a single transaction.

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: The index of the event within the message, allowing for the examination of multiple events within a single message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address or entity that initiated the transaction, representing the source of the transaction.

columns.name: message_type
columns.description: The type of message associated with the transaction, categorizing the transaction based on its purpose.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the transaction data was ingested into the system, representing the time of data processing.

tables.name: dydx_place_order
tables.description: This table contains information about place orders executed on the Cosmos ecosystem. It provides insights into market activity and order execution.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Height of the block in which the transaction was included.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of the block in which the transaction was included.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: Unique hash of the transaction that executed the place order.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: Index of the transaction in the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Index of the message in the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: Index of the action in the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: Address of the account that executed the place order.

columns.name: subaccount
columns.description: Subaccount address associated with the sender.

columns.name: order_id
columns.description: Unique identifier of the place order.

columns.name: quantums
columns.description: Quantity of the asset in quanta, the base unit of the asset.

columns.name: subticks
columns.description: Quantity of the asset in subticks, a smaller unit than quanta.

columns.name: market_id
columns.description: Identifier of the market in which the place order was executed.

columns.name: direction
columns.description: Direction of the place order (buy or sell).

columns.name: type
columns.description: Type of the place order.

columns.name: trigger_condition
columns.description: Trigger condition of the place order.

columns.name: trigger_subticks
columns.description: Trigger quantity of the asset in subticks.

columns.name: memo
columns.description: Memo associated with the place order.

columns.name: reduce_only
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the place order is reduce- only.

columns.name: expiration_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp at which the place order expires.

columns.name: on_expiration
columns.description: Action to take when the place order expires.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp at which the transaction was ingested into the system.

tables.name: dydx_settled_funding
tables.description: This table contains information about settled funding events for perpetual contracts in the Cosmos ecosystem. It provides insights into the funding paid by each subaccount to maintain the market's health.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction was included.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in which the transaction was included.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message.

columns.name: subaccount
columns.description: The subaccount that performed the action.

columns.name: subaccount_number
columns.description: The unique identifier of the subaccount.

columns.name: funding_paid_quote_quantums
columns.description: The amount of funding paid in quote units.

columns.name: perpetual_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the perpetual contract.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: dydx_state
tables.description: This table provides an overview of the current state of the DyDX protocol within the Cosmos ecosystem, offering insights into the system's functioning and key parameters.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The type of state being recorded, indicating the category of information being tracked.

columns.name: block
columns.description: The block number in which the state was recorded, serving as a unique identifier within the blockchain.

columns.name: block_time
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was created, allowing for the analysis of temporal relationships and trends.

columns.name: deleted
columns.description: A flag indicating whether the state has been deleted or marked for removal, potentially due to errors or updates.

columns.name: val
columns.description: The value associated with the state, which can be a numerical or string representation of the data.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system, providing information on data processing and synchronization.

tables.name: dydx_transactions
tables.description: Cosmos Ecosystem Blockchain Transaction Data. This table contains various information related to transactions executed on different blockchains within the Cosmos ecosystem.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction was executed.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: The ID of the blockchain on which the transaction was executed.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction.

columns.name: tx_info
columns.description: Additional information about the transaction.

columns.name: tx_log_message
columns.description: A log message related to the transaction.

columns.name: memo
columns.description: A memo or note related to the transaction.

columns.name: fee
columns.description: The fee associated with the transaction.

columns.name: tx_code
columns.description: The code or status of the transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: gas_used
columns.description: The amount of gas used by the transaction.

columns.name: gas_wanted
columns.description: The amount of gas requested by the transaction.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the transaction was ingested.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: The version of the schema used to process the transaction.

columns.name: fee_coins
columns.description: The coins or tokens used to pay the transaction fee.

columns.name: fee_granter
columns.description: The account that granted the transaction fee.

columns.name: fee_payer
columns.description: The account that paid the transaction fee.

columns.name: gas_limit
columns.description: The maximum amount of gas that can be used by the transaction.

columns.name: single_sign_mode
columns.description: A flag indicating whether the transaction was executed in single sign mode.

columns.name: multi_sign_json
columns.description: JSON data related to multiple signatures required for the transaction.

columns.name: timeout_height
columns.description: The height of the block at which the transaction will timeout if not executed.

tables.name: dydx_transfer
tables.description: This table contains a detailed record of all transactions from the Cosmos ecosystem, including transfers between accounts. The data is aggregated from various blockchains within the ecosystem.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction was recorded.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in which the transaction was recorded.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The account address of the sender.

columns.name: sender_subaccount
columns.description: The subaccount address of the sender (if applicable).

columns.name: recipient
columns.description: The account address of the recipient.

columns.name: recipient_subaccount
columns.description: The subaccount address of the recipient (if applicable).

columns.name: quantums
columns.description: The amount of tokens transferred.

columns.name: asset_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the asset being transferred.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the transaction data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: dydx_tx_messages
tables.description: This table contains transaction messages from various Cosmos ecosystem blockchains, providing insights into the transactions and events that have occurred within the network.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction occurred.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the Cosmos blockchain network where the transaction took place.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the transaction within the blockchain network.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block it belongs to.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: message_type
columns.description: The type of message sent as part of the transaction.

columns.name: message
columns.description: The actual message sent as part of the transaction.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: The version of the schema used to store the transaction data.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the transaction data was ingested into the system.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block containing the transaction was created.

tables.name: dydx_undelegate
tables.description: This table contains information on transactions where a validator is undelegating tokens from a delegator in the Cosmos ecosystem. The data is sourced from blockchain events.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction was included

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in which the transaction was included

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction in the block

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message in the transaction

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action in the message

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The account address of the sender

columns.name: validator
columns.description: The validator account address that is undelegating tokens

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens being undelegated

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the tokens being undelegated

columns.name: completion_time
columns.description: The time at which the undelegation will be completed

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the transaction was ingested into the system

tables.name: dydx_validators
tables.description: This table provides information about validators on the Cosmos ecosystem, including their operator addresses, account information, and commission rates.

columns.name: operator_address
columns.description: The operator address associated with the validator.

columns.name: account_address
columns.description: The account address of the validator's account.

columns.name: consensus_pubkey
columns.description: The consensus public key of the validator.

columns.name: jailed
columns.description: A boolean indicating whether the validator is currently jailed.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The status of the validator (e.g. 'UNBONDED', 'BONDED', etc.).

columns.name: tokens
columns.description: The total tokens bonded by the validator.

columns.name: moniker
columns.description: The moniker (name) of the validator.

columns.name: identity
columns.description: The identity of the validator.

columns.name: website
columns.description: The website associated with the validator.

columns.name: security_contact
columns.description: The security contact's email address.

columns.name: details
columns.description: Additional details about the validator.

columns.name: unbonding_height
columns.description: The block height at which the validator will be unbonded.

columns.name: unbonding_time
columns.description: The time at which the validator will be unbonded.

columns.name: commission_rate
columns.description: The commission rate of the validator (as a percentage).

columns.name: commission_max_rate
columns.description: The maximum commission rate of the validator (as a percentage).

columns.name: commission_max_change_rate
columns.description: The maximum rate at which the commission rate can change.

columns.name: commission_update_time
columns.description: The time at which the commission rate was last updated.

columns.name: min_self_delegation
columns.description: The minimum self- delegation amount for the validator.

columns.name: snapshot_height
columns.description: The block height at which the validator's snapshot was taken.

columns.name: snapshot_time
columns.description: The time at which the validator's snapshot was taken.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the data was ingested into the database.

tables.name: dydx_vote
tables.description: This table tracks voting activity on DyDX proposals. The data originates from blockchains within the Cosmos ecosystem.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the vote transaction was included.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in which the vote transaction was included.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction that initiated the vote.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The position of the transaction in the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The position of the message in the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The position of the action in the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the account that initiated the vote.

columns.name: proposal_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the proposal being voted on.

columns.name: option
columns.description: The selected option for the proposal vote.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: dydx_withdrawal
tables.description: This table contains a comprehensive record of withdrawals from the DyDX platform, aggregated from various blockchains within the Cosmos ecosystem. It provides valuable insights into the financial transactions and movements of assets across the network.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the withdrawal transaction was recorded.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in which the withdrawal transaction was recorded.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: A unique identifier for the withdrawal transaction, generated by the Cosmos blockchain network.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the withdrawal transaction within a block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the withdrawal transaction message within a block.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the withdrawal transaction action within a message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The wallet address of the account that initiated the withdrawal transaction.

columns.name: sender_subaccount
columns.description: A sub- account associated with the sender wallet address, if applicable.

columns.name: recipient
columns.description: The wallet address of the account that received the withdrawn assets.

columns.name: quantums
columns.description: The quantity of assets withdrawn from the sender's account.

columns.name: asset_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the asset class being withdrawn, such as a cryptocurrency or token.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the withdrawal transaction data was ingested into the database.
